Class WindowMatchers

  • java.lang.Object

  • @Unstable(reason="needs more tests")
public class WindowMatchers
extends java.lang.Object
    TestFX matchers for Window

      static org.hamcrest.Matcher<javafx.stage.Window> isFocused()
